abstract: Trivia quizzes for smartphones feature chats, “trophies” for winners and the ability to play Facebook friends or opponents worldwide.
snippet: Trivia quizzes for smartphones feature chats, “trophies” for winners and the ability to play Facebook friends or opponents worldwide.
lead_paragraph: WHEN I’m out with friends I sometimes challenge them with a few trivia questions for fun. But plenty of trivia quiz smartphone apps can do a much better job than I do, and they have social media features too.

headline.main: Video Feature: Take On the World With Trivia Game Apps
headline.print_headline: Take On the World in Trivial Matters, or Keep It Among Friends
